title: Remove bank logo from debit card and restore original content

requirements.text: Remove the bank logo image from the top-right corner of the DebitCard component and restore the original content that was displayed in that area before the logo was added (e.g., the bank name text or any other original branding element).

quotes: can you cancel the logo and add what was there before

acceptanceCriteria: The bank logo image is no longer rendered in the top-right corner of the debit card
The original content (text or element) that existed before the logo was added is restored in its place
The debit card layout remains visually consistent and well-styled

constraints: Do not alter any other part of the DebitCard component beyond removing the logo and restoring the original top-right content
nonGoals: Changing any other component outside of DebitCard.tsx
